name: Within Reach
description: I served years in mental prison. Yes, I did commit a crime. Self-betrayal. Abandoning my ambition for other people's expectations. The judge: my conscience. The accuser: my soul. I thought it was going to be a life sentence. It could have been. I could have died there. But a tiny voice kept whispering: "Make amends." I started looking around, trying to find its source. That's how I found the key to my cell was hanging within my reach the entire time… Was it easy to leave though? All I could see outside was darkness and uncertainty.
